## Checks

- [ ] Builds locally (`cargo build`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`cargo test`)
- [ ] Clippy passes (`cargo clippy`)
- [ ] Formatted (`cargo fmt`)
- [ ] No API contract breaks
- [ ] CI green
- [ ] Linked issue/ticket (if any)
